ext_name.description: The name of the extension. Unless there is a really good reason to you shouldn't translate this

ext_description.message: Get the most out of your favourite anime site by turning it into a streaming site.

ext_tooltip.description: Text shown to the user when they hover over the logo. On mobile this is shown instead of the logo.

ext_badge__new_version.description: Text displayed on the logo if the extension updated. Should be as short as possible

general__loading.description: General loading text for when things are being loaded

sentry__description.message: There seems to have been a bug which caused Dolos to break. We would appreciate if you could report this error to us!

snackbar__dismiss.description: Button shown on Snackbars (notifications) to hide them.

popup__nav__debug.description: Link to open the debug page. Only visible when debug mode is activated

popup__feedback__github_issues__text.message: If you have any suggestions or bugs you would like to report please feel free to create a new Issue over at Dolos' GitHub repository.

popup__help__information__header.description: Title shown above the information table

popup__help__information__dolos_version.description: Name of the table row containing the version of Dolos

popup__help__information__grobber_versio.description: Name of the table row containing the version of Grobber

changelog__current_version__header.description: Title shown above the changes for the current version.

changelog__previous_versions__header.description: Title shown above the old changelogs.

subscriptions__anime__featured_subscript.description: List header shown for subscriptions whose Animes have unseen episodes.

subscriptions__anime__all_subscriptions.description: List header shown for subscriptions whose Animes don't have unseen episodes. This header is only shown if there are episodes with unseen episodes

subscriptions__item__tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over a subscription

subscriptions__error__unknown.description: Error shown if something unknown is wrong with a subscription

subscriptions__error__uidunknown.description: Error shown if Grobber rejected the uid

subscriptions_fix_failed.description: Snackbar text shown if no fix was found for the subscription error

subscriptions_fix_successful.description: Snackbar text shown if subscription error was fixed

options__header.description: App bar title for the settings page

options__embed_providers__title.description: Title for the embed providers settings

options__video__general__autoplay__on.description: Text displayed when autoplay is turned on

options__video__general__autoplay__off.message: Episodes start playing when requested to
options__video__general__autoplay__off.description: Text displayed when autoplay is turned off

options__video__general__auto_next__on.message: Automatically continue to the next episode after the current one ends
options__video__general__auto_next__on.description: Text displayed when autoNext is turned on

options__video__general__auto_next__off.message: Stay on the current episode after it finishes
options__video__general__auto_next__off.description: Text displayed when autoNext is turned off

options__video__general__prefer_dolos_pl.description: Text displayed when preferDolosPlayer is turned on
Text displayed when preferDolosPlayer is turned off

options__embed_providers__general__title.description: Title shown for the general embed providers settings

options__embed_providers__general__allow.description: Switch which specifies whether Dolos should show unknown embeds
Text shown when allowUnknown is turned on
Text shown when allowUnknown is turned off

options__embed_providers__blocked__title.description: Title shown for the blocked embed providers settings

options__embed_providers__blocked__place.description: Place holder shown when no embed providers have been blocked

options__embed_providers__order__title.description: Title shown for the custom embed provider ordering

options__debug__advanced__header.description: Title for advanced settings in the dolos debug menu

options__debug__advanced__debug_mode.description: Switch for the advanced debug mode.

anime__search__low_confidence_warning.message: Only $CERTAINTY$% sure that the correct Anime was selected.
anime__search__low_confidence_warning.description: Warning that is shown when the certainty for the search result is below a certain threshold.

anime__search__low_confidence_warning__s.description: Button that is shown next to the low confidence warning.

anime__continue_watching__start.description: Text shown on the continue watching button if the user hasn't started the Anime yet

anime__show_episode__failed.description: Message displayed when Dolos couldn't navigate the user to an episode

anime__subscription_not_possible.description: Tooltip text when a subscription is impossible. For instance when the user has already seen all episodes

anime__subscribe__help.message: Get notified when a new episode comes out

anime__unsubscribe__help.message: No longer get notified when a new episode comes out

episode__embedded_stream__warning.message: Embeds aren't controlled by Dolos. Your progress won't automatically update!
